001package xjtlu.cpt111.assignment.quiz.lang;
002
003import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
004
005/**
006 * Interface for application constants
007 * 
008 * @author H.-P. Lam, Xi'an Jiaotong-Liverpool University (XJTLU)
009 * @since 2024.09.10
010 * @since version 0.0.1
011 * @version Last modified: 2024.09.10
012 */
013public interface AppConstants {
014
015        /**
016         * Whether the application currently in debug mode
017         */
018        boolean IS_DEBUG = false;
019
020        /**
021         * Whether the application currently in verbose mode
022         */
023        boolean IS_VERBOSE = false;
024
025        /**
026         * Whether an exception should throw in case of problem in the question
027         */
028        boolean THROW_INVALID_EXCEPTION = false;
029
030        /**
031         * Question options indentator
032         */
033        String QUESTION_OPTION_INDENTATOR = "  ";
034
035        /**
036         * Interface for document object model
037         */
038        public interface Model {
039
040                /**
041                 * QName for question difficulty
042                 */
043                QName TAG_DIFFICULTY = new QName("difficulty");
044
045                /**
046                 * QName for whether the option is a correct answer of the question
047                 */
048                QName TAG_ANSWER = new QName("answer");
049
050        }
051
052}
